body_html: @girving Yes. The commit a999474 fixes a regression that should provide a 3x-5x speedup, depending on the exact configuration. The next step to improve performance is to write a contraction mapper in eigen_cuboid_convolutions.h, but I haven't had the chance to do that yet.

body: @girving Yes. The commit a999474 fixes a regression that should provide a 3x-5x speedup, depending on the exact configuration. The next step to improve performance is to write a contraction mapper in eigen_cuboid_convolutions.h, but I haven't had the chance to do that yet.
